title: Sticking With Indy, Trusting Philly, and More Week 2 Bets | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We discuss Joe Burrow’s impressive Thursday night performance (2:02) before getting into our favorite gambling picks for Week 2. We discuss the Eagles’ chances against the Rams (29:30), the Colts’ bounceback potential (43:37), betting underdogs in Week 2 (58:45), teasing the Ravens and Chiefs (1:10:45), and more.
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
